113
- Add missing service alias
- Remove kodi as a dependent service
- Hide password on settings page

112
- Update aml-vnc-server to 1.2.0

111
- Fix hash to patched 1.1.0 package
- Add missing values to the default settings xml
- Restart service on settings change

110
- Update aml-vnc-server to 1.1.0
- Modify the service start script to be compatible with the new binary
- Add Hungarian translation of the add-on

109
- Replace package source git repository and update to 1.0.1
- Remove service startup delay option and fix it to 5 seconds
- Rework start and service scripts

108
- Reformat help message and add missing arguments
- Make IPv6 listen port consistent with IPv4

107
- Fix resolution issue when used other than native
- Display hostname instead of static distroname

106
- Add delayed start option

105
- Create static addon source files
- Add service logging capability
- Replace the old language string file format
- Change service start dependencies

104
- Update libvncserver to 0.9.14

103
- Minimizes artifacts: include COMPRECT in min calculation

- Initial release
